and carton_width

and widthL_line

and working_procedure

and print_num

and card_size

=#{item.value}
<>#{item.value}
>#{item.value}
>=#{item.value}
<#{item.value}
<=#{item.value}
like #{item.value}"%"
like "%"#{item.value}
and fake=0
